description:
When the thief and master of disguises, Betsumon, shows up, Tagiru wants to Hunt him, but Gumdramon is unwilling. Even Ryouma and the other rival Hunters have fallen victim to Betsumon`s tricks, so Tagiru and company team up with them to stop him. Encouraged by Taiki, Gumdramon at last faces Betsumon in battle and reveals that the two of them used to be partners - but Betsumon no longer remembers him. Can Gumdramon recover his lost friendship with Betsumon?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Resemblance or None at All? The Thief in Disguise, Betsumon
似てる? 似てない? 変装怪盗ベツモン
